name: Citizen
description: The starting job. Does nothing, has no rights.

name: Farmer
description: Can use !harvest once per hour to harvest crops. Crops can be sold, used for crafting or used for promotions.

name: Lumberjack
description: Can use !chop once per hour to harvest wood. Can be used for promotions and can be sold.

name: Fisherman
description: Can use !fish once per hour to catch fish. Fish can be used for cooking, can be sold and used for promotions. Catching a fish without bait has a 50% chance, with bait 95%.

name: Cook
description: Can craft delicious stews to sell. Stews require an onion, pumpkin and a tomato. Adding a fish makes an even more valueable stew!

name: Merchant
description: Sells items for 10% more points. Cannot buy items though.

name: Lawyer
description: Use '!objection <username>' to free a user from timeout.

name: Banker
description: Gain 5% interest on own points using !interest, up to 5.000 points.

name: Judge
description: Can free users '!pardon <username>' or issue 2-minute timeouts '!verdict <username>'.

name: King
description: Distribute 10.000 points '!royalDecree' to all, collect taxes '!royalTax' or knight users to give them a +50% points buff for 15 minutes '!knight <username>'
